text: Allahvukku vanakkattai tuymaiyakkiyavarkalaka (tavarana valiyiliruntu vilaki cariyana valiyil) pitippullavarkalaka allahvai avarkal vananka ventum, melum tolukaiyai avarkal nilainattaventum, melum jakattai avarkal valanka ventum enpatait tavira (veretuvum) avarkalukkuk kattalaiyitappatavillai. Itutan nerana markkamakum
